inclusion.criterion: Lifetime history of ST with at least one risk factor: heavy drinking within the past 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Seeking treatment through the Women's Primary Care Clinics at the Central Texas VA Healthcare System
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand study procedures in English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not actively in suicidal or homicidal crisis warranting imminent hospitalization
inclusion.label: met

notes: 54-year-old obese woman with abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting. Past medical history includes hypercholesterolemia and 2 NVDs.
